meanings.definition: Preserved or cooked in a pot.
meanings.sent1: The potted soup was delicious and warm.
meanings.sent2: She served the potted stew at the family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The potted jam was so good, it disappeared in a blink!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the potted curry filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's potted pickles had a unique tangy flavor.

meanings.definition: Placed in a pot for growing.
meanings.sent1: The potted plant on the windowsill bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She watered the potted flowers in the garden every morning.
meanings.sent3: The potted herbs added a fresh touch to the kitchen decor.
meanings.sent4: The potted succulents thrived in the sunny spot.
meanings.sent5: The potted tree grew tall and strong in its container.
